min8Chars: Password must be at least 8 characters long
tooWeakPassword: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
name: Name must be at least 1 character long
lastName: Last name must be at least 1 character long
phone: Please enter a valid phone number
address: Address must be at least 1 character long
city: City must be at least 1 character long
country: Country must be at least 1 character long
postalCode: Postal code must be at least 1 character long
shopName: Shop name must contain atleast 3 characters
shopDesc: Please enter a valid shop description about your store that contains atleast 10 characters
productName: Product name must contain atleast 3 characters
letters: Product name must contain only letters and numbers
prodDesc: Please describe your porduct in 20 or more characters
price: Please enter a valid price that is more than 0
maxSize: Image size must be less than 100KB
formats: Please add an image in JPG, JPEG, PNG or WEBP format
productDetails: Please explain your product in depth, so that customers can understand what they are buying, you can choose the rich text editor to make it easier for you. And make it more appealing to the customer.
moreThanOriginal: Sale price must be less than original price
rating: Please enter a rating between 1 and 5
ratingDesc: Please enter a rating description that is at least 10 characters long
doNotMatch: Password and confirm password do not match
cantBeSame: New password and old password cannot be the same
adminLevel: Please enter an administrator level for the user if you wish to promote them to an administrator
